mapper.select: SELECT ID AS "id" ,TITLE AS "title" ,ARTIST AS "artist" ,ISSUE_DATE AS "issueDate" ,GENRE AS "genre" ,COVER_PHOTO AS "coverPhoto" ,CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor" ,CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime" ,UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor" ,UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM ALBUM WHERE ID = #{id}

SELECT ID AS "id" ,TITLE AS "title" ,ARTIST AS "artist" ,ISSUE_DATE AS "issueDate" ,GENRE AS "genre" ,COVER_PHOTO AS "coverPhoto" ,CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor" ,CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime" ,UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor" ,UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM ALBUM WHERE ID = #{id} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ID AS "id" ,TITLE AS "title" ,ARTIST AS "artist" ,ISSUE_DATE AS "issueDate" ,GENRE AS "genre" ,COVER_PHOTO AS "coverPhoto" ,CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor" ,CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime" ,UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor" ,UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM ALBUM WHERE 1 = 1 AND ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{id}, '%') AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') AND ARTIST LIKE CONCAT('%', #{artist}, '%') AND ISSUE_DATE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{issueDate}, '%') AND GENRE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{genre}, '%') AND COVER_PHOTO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{coverPhoto}, '%') AND CREATE_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{createAuthor}, '%') AND UPDATE_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{updateAuthor}, '%') AND CREATE_DATETIME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{createDatetime}, '%') AND UPDATE_DATETIME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{updateDatetime}, '%') ORDER BY ${_theOrderByCondition} LIMIT ${_theFetchStart}, ${_theFetchSize}
